https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6RTL9KTN7zWzmvJ8F7yY3kU4wug.jpg In deep Hengduan Mountain Range, western Yunnan of China, there hides a special village which is not known by people outside. All the villagers inhabited here are children between 6 and 14. They live in the village all year round to complete their six-year study in a primary school. A Student Village
